front.title: RSVP-TE Extensions in Support of Distributed Impairment Validation with Feedback Control

abstract.t: The impairment validation of the light path in a Wavelength SwitchedOptical Network (WSON) can be implemented with a distributed hop byhop process by signaling protocol. This memo proposes feedbackcontrol of some parameters related to impairment evaluation resultswith the extensions to the Resource Reservation Traffic Engineering(RSVP-TE) signaling protocol in order to establish an optical pathwith a higher probability.
